2015

An ongoing project of a new desktop wallpaper calendar every month for the year 2015.

January

Prepare to lose some icons. We start the year off with a chaotic mix of found imagery & swiss-inspired design. Download the wallpaper here.

February

A minimal typographic calendar-a-day that features Nexa by Fontfabric and a fact about the current date. Download the full set here.

March

Featuring strong geometric shapes, portraiture from a 1951 issue of LIFE magazine, and Cooper Hewitt’s eponymous typeface, this calendar is both visually complex and devastatingly simple. You can download the full-size version here.

April

Minimal to its core, this calendar features Atipo’s Geomanist and not much else. You can download the full-size version here.

May

A fun and open wallpaper featuring Lost Type’s Klinic Slab. You can download the full-size version here .

June

This wallpaper starts the summer off with some color. Inspired by the work of Piet Zwart. You can download the full-size version here .

July

Bomb pop meets literal bombs popping in this wallpaper. You can download the full-size version here .

an exploration of design’s most economical form
